body_html:
yeah thanks, kinda knew that isn't best practice but I wanted to try to use lr-decay and I didn't manage to get one of these schedulers working...^^

So I'm still trying to build from source (without Anaconda; Python 3.6 Win10 64bit).

I installed all dependcies:

pip install pyyaml  
pip install setuptools 
pip install cmake 
pip install cffi 
pip install typing

numpy+mkl was already installed.

then I used:

git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch

set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11

but when running:

python setup.py install

I get an error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 104, in <module>
    from tools.setup_helpers.env import check_env_flag
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'tools.setup_helpers'

I also tried:

pip install git+https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch

but there I get the following warning:

Subprocess output does not appear to be encoded as cp1252

and then there're "millions" of lines of code that state all sorts of errors...

Do you guys have any advice for me?

Thanks

body:
yeah thanks, kinda knew that isn't best practice but I wanted to try to use lr-decay and I didn't manage to get one of these schedulers working...^^

So I'm still trying to build from source (without Anaconda; Python 3.6 Win10 64bit).

I installed all dependcies:
```
pip install pyyaml  
pip install setuptools 
pip install cmake 
pip install cffi 
pip install typing
```

numpy+mkl was already installed.

then I used:

```
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch

set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11
```
but when running:

`python setup.py install`

I get an error:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 104, in <module>
    from tools.setup_helpers.env import check_env_flag
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'tools.setup_helpers'
```

I also tried:

`pip install git+https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch`

but there I get the following warning:

`Subprocess output does not appear to be encoded as cp1252`

and then there're "millions" of lines of code that state all sorts of errors...

Do you guys have any advice for me?

Thanks
